body: This sounds like a conflict with another package. Can you list the packages you're using, or do you have your package on NPM so I could take a look?

```
async@1.4.2 node_modules\async

hunspell-spellchecker@1.0.2 node_modules\hunspell-spellchecker

marked@0.3.5 node_modules\marked

commander@2.8.1 node_modules\commander
â””â”€â”€ graceful-readlink@1.0.1

chalk@1.1.0 node_modules\chalk
â”œâ”€â”€ escape-string-regexp@1.0.3
â”œâ”€â”€ supports-color@2.0.0
â”œâ”€â”€ ansi-styles@2.1.0
â”œâ”€â”€ strip-ansi@3.0.0 (ansi-regex@2.0.0)
â””â”€â”€ has-ansi@2.0.0 (ansi-regex@2.0.0)

glob@5.0.14 node_modules\glob
â”œâ”€â”€ path-is-absolute@1.0.0
â”œâ”€â”€ inherits@2.0.1
â”œâ”€â”€ once@1.3.2 (wrappy@1.0.1)
â”œâ”€â”€ inflight@1.0.4 (wrappy@1.0.1)
â””â”€â”€ minimatch@2.0.10 (brace-expansion@1.1.0)

inquirer@0.9.0 node_modules\inquirer
â”œâ”€â”€ figures@1.3.5
â”œâ”€â”€ strip-ansi@3.0.0
â”œâ”€â”€ ansi-regex@2.0.0
â”œâ”€â”€ cli-width@1.0.1
â”œâ”€â”€ through@2.3.8
â”œâ”€â”€ run-async@0.1.0 (once@1.3.2)
â”œâ”€â”€ readline2@0.1.1 (mute-stream@0.0.4, strip-ansi@2.0.1)
â”œâ”€â”€ rx-lite@2.5.2
â””â”€â”€ lodash@3.10.1
```

Looking at the source code I cannot see how something else could cause this...

windows, node 0.12.6.

Looking at the source code it can _only_ be a V8 bug in node 0.12.0 - the code is valid

I think more specifically, it could very well be a bug in the Windows build. Can you try downgrading to 0.12.0 to see if the bug is still present? That'll be useful if you file a bug report with the Node team.

Having the same problem, mentioned here - https://github.com/sindresorhus/time-grunt/issues/66

Mac OS X, node v0.12.5 (reproducible for 0.12.7).

Even if I removed `time-grunt` usage, now my `uglify` grunt task if failing,

```
Running "uglify:main" (uglify) task
[D] Task source: /Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt-contrib-uglify/tasks/uglify.js
Warning: builder is not defined Use --force to continue.
ReferenceError: builder is not defined
    at Chalk.builder (/Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt-contrib-uglify/node_modules/chalk/index.js:40:27)
    at /Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt-contrib-uglify/tasks/uglify.js:176:45
    at Array.forEach (native)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt-contrib-uglify/tasks/uglify.js:63:16)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt/lib/grunt/task.js:264:15)
    at Object.thisTask.fn (/Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt/lib/grunt/task.js:82:16)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt/lib/util/task.js:301:30)
    at Task.runTaskFn (/Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt/lib/util/task.js:251:24)
    at Task.<anonymous> (/Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt/lib/util/task.js:300:12)
    at /Users/alexanderbeletsky/Development/Projects/mylorry/shift-planner-office/node_modules/grunt/lib/util/task.js:227:11
```

In `uglify`,

``` js
      grunt.verbose.writeln('File ' + chalk.cyan(f.dest) + ' created: ' +
        maxmin(result.max, output, options.report === 'gzip'));
```

That's pretty serious for me. Any help will be really appreciated.

The only fix I had was to edit the files in `node_modules/xxx/chalk/index.js` https://github.com/chalk/chalk/blob/6142553bb5d7b3e7fbcea76b8ccf876f373e1bf1/index.js#L39 and remove the name from the function expression.

it _must_ be an obscure V8 bug effecting `0.12` and effecting chalk only in very specific scenarios.

repository.name: chalk
repository.description: ðŸ– Terminal string styling done right

body:
I've made a PR with that fix. I can't see a reason not to fix it, since the code is equivalent, but doesn't randomly fail for at least people >= 2 .

@alexbeletsky I forgot the fix I put in my repo might help you too - https://github.com/lukeapage/node-markdown-spellcheck/blob/master/es6/cli.js#L37
hey @lukeapage thanks a lot for this! I hope PR is merged as soon as possible.
@lukeapage as I mentioned in the PR (and I'll mention here for completeness), can either you or @alexbeletsky provide some code that reproduces this?
@caitp, knowing you work on V8, does this bug ring a bell with you? I've searched the V8 issues and I can't see a named function expression bug that has been raised or fixed recently

issue.title: builder is not defined

repository.name: time-grunt
repository.description: Display the elapsed execution time of grunt tasks

body: Reproduced; like 90% sure this is indeed a V8/Node bug.
@lukeapage on phone but I'll take a look in a minute. I might need to see a bit more code
